name: Adar Tallon
content: Adar Tallon was a human male who served in the Galactic Empire and later the Alliance to Restore the Republic after his defection. Tallon authored the book Treatise on Starfighter Tactics that explored the rules of starfighter engagement in detail, identifying five stages in any battle. Tallon described the stages as Detection, Closing, Attack, Maneuver, and Disengagement; which were collectively known as the Five Stages of Combat. Adar Tallon served as an Alliance officer within the Alliance Military, and at one point analyzed a battle between Alliance and Imperial forces on a hologram.
